title: NPCI likely to restore retail payment operations of co-op banks by today: Sources
description: C-Edge Technologies, a tech service provider for cooperative banks, experienced a ransomware attack that disrupted online payment services for over 100 banks. The National Payments Corporation of India (NPCI) responded by isolating C-Edge from its payment systems to prevent further issues.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
